import React, { Component } from 'react'; import PropTypes from 'prop-types' import Book from './Book' class ListBookShelfs extends Component{ static propTypes = { currently_reading: PropTypes.array.isRequired, want_to_read: PropTypes.array.isRequired, read: PropTypes.array.isRequired } render (){ const { currently_reading} = this.props //let showing_currently_reading, showing_want_to_read,showing_read console.log(this.props) return(

MyReads

Currently Reading

    {currently_reading.map((book) => ( ))}

Want to Read

    {want_to_read.map((book) => ( ))}

Read

  1. The Hobbit
    J.R.R. Tolkien
  2. Oh, the Places You'll Go!
    Seuss
  3. The Adventures of Tom Sawyer
    Mark Twain
) } } export default ListBookShelfs
